greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function for A235033.
comment: This is the characteristic function for A235033, cf. examples there. Cf. also the characteristic functions A236861 & A236862.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8191
formula: a(n) = 0 iff A236380(n)=0, 1 otherwise. [This formula completely defines the sequence]
Other observations, which partially describe the behavior of the sequence:
For all x, y > 0, if either a(x) = 1 or a(y) = 1, then both a(x*y) = 1 and a(A048720(x,y)) = 1.
xref: Has zeros in the same positions as A236380.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 24 2014
